metadata.title: Google Chrome is installed
metadata.description: Google Chrome is installed

modified.comment: Added anchor to pattern match in ste:11937

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:tst:41561 - The attached file replaces existing Chrome objects with new objects containing the set of the existing object, which is correct for individual installs, and the registry key used by the all users installer.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - Adding 18 new definitions for recent chrome CVEs.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Make registry key checking faster.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15822 - Added windows_view behavior to Google Chrome on 64-bit Windows objects.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Updated Google Chrome Inventory
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - definitions for the CVEs addressed by version 29.0.1547.57 of Chrome on Windows
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - New Vulnerability Definitions for Chrome addressed by versions 31.0.1650.57 and 31.0.1650.63.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - new vulnerabilities of Google Chrome

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome is installed (HKU)
Check if Google Chrome is installed (HKLM)

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow invocation of file selection dialog' is set to 'Enabled'
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Allow invocation of file selection dialog' is set to 'Enabled'

registry_test.comment: Check if Google Chrome is installed (HKEY_USERS)
Check if Google Chrome is installed (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE)

registry_object.comment: The registry key to check if Google Chrome is installed
The registry key to check if Google Chrome is installed (admin install for all users)

win:registry_state.comment: The registry key matches with any version of Google Chrome

local_variable.comment: Full key path of Google Chrome uninstall registry key under HKEY_USERS
